alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Collier, northwestern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Felda, or 8 miles northeast of Immokalee, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Immokalee, Port La Belle, Felda, Devils Garden, Ortona, Muse, Keri and Bunker Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
